triples.evidence: By capturing and analyzing this signal, we can reconstruct images

concepts.term: It oscillates at the resonance frequency,

evidence: The FID is the fundamental nuclear magnetic resonance signal. ... its strength is proportional to the local proton density.

triples.evidence: Once the radiofrequency pulse is turned off, the magnetization vector begins to relax back toward the main magnetic field, capital B naught. In this process, the excess energy that was absorbed is released.
